doc.field: - Courier Corp said it expects to report a small loss for the second fiscal quarter against a profit of 828,000 dlrs a year ago. The company attributed the loss to competitive pressures which have cut gross margins. In addition, it said it is incurring significant expenses from management programs aimed at reducing costs and boosting productivity. It said its Murray Printing Co unit has undertaken a program of extended work hours, and salary and job cuts which will save more than 1.5 mln dlrs annually.
